issue.title: [CF 801] attempt to index global 'CNDT' (a nil value)
issue.body:
Got this in r791 and r792 dragging and dropping an icon onto another trying to make an "icon shown" condition.

Date: 2013-04-28 04:38:34
ID: 1
Error occured in: Global
Count: 1
Message: ...omponents\Core\Conditions\Categories\Misc_config.lua line 51:
   attempt to index global 'CNDT' (a nil value)
Debug:
   ...omponents\Core\Conditions\Categories\Misc_config.lua:51: method()
   ...ns\TellMeWhen\Components\Core\Common\IconDragger.lua:281: func()
   ..\FrameXML\UIDropDownMenu.lua:710: UIDropDownMenuButton_OnClick()
   [string "*:OnClick"]:1:
      [string "*:OnClick"]:1
